import React from 'react'; import {MDBIcon, MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarBrand, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavbarToggler, MDBCollapse, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink, MDBContainer, MDBMask, MDBView } from 'mdbreact'; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; import { BrowserRouter, Switch, Route, Link, NavLink, } from "react-router-dom"; import SignIn from './SignIn'; import { MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownItem, MDBNavbarLink, } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import { MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBDropdownLink,MDBNavbarItem } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import './myStyle.css' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import SignUp from './SignUp'; import CompanyUpdate from './CompanyUpdate'; import MyCustomers from './MyCustomers'; import CalculationCustomers from './CalculationCustomers'; import Home from './Home'; import CompanyDelete from './CompanyDelete'; import ChartsPage from './Chart' import LittleChartsPage from './LittleChart' import logo from '../Assets/logo.jpg' export default function FullPageIntroWithFixedNavbar() { const [state,setState]=useState({ collapse: "false",isWideEnough: "false"}); let IsCompany = false; console.log(IsCompany.codeCompany); return (
{!state.isWideEnough && }
    פרופיל התחברות {(IsCompany==undefined)&& הרשמה } {(IsCompany)&& עדכון } {(IsCompany)&& מחיקה }
אודות {(IsCompany)&& הלקוחות שלי } {(IsCompany)&& סיווג חדש } {(IsCompany.codeCompany)&& חישוב אחרון } {(IsCompany.codeCompany)&& תרשים שנתי }
); }
